project1.desc: Pomodoro is an interactive web application designed to enhance user productivity using the Pomodoro technique.
project1.html: HTML: Structuring the user interface with semantic HTML for better accessibility.
project1.css: CSS: Styling the application with responsive design.
project1.js: JavaScript: Implementing the timer and music control.
project1.conclusion: Conclusion: This project demonstrates my ability to develop a functional and user-friendly application.
